data.host: Victron venus host name or IP

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of Victron Device, usually mDNS name like 'venus.local'
data_description.port: The MQTT port on the host. Normally it is 1883.
data_description.username: Username for the Victron Device, default is empty. This is not your VRM username.
data_description.password: Password for the Victron Device, default is empty. This is not your VRM password.
data_description.ssl: Indicates whether to use SSL to connect to the Victron Device. Normally it is disabled.
